messages.title: NO TO A SECOND REFERENDUM YES TO A REAL BREXIT
messages.content: This is a Brexit General Election. Our priority is to stop a Corbyn-led Remainer alliance sneaking into power and using a rigged second referendum to overturn the votes of 17.4 million Leave voters. That's why we are fighting to win Labour and Remain-held seats, such as yours.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We must control our laws, borders, money and defence
Let's make Parliament serve the People
Keep investing, better management, less waste
Spend £200bn on transport and jobs in the Regions
We need a fair, firm points-based system

mentions.tacticalSituation: References to historical voting patterns suggesting tactical voting against Labour and the Tories.

issues.brexitEurope: Our priority is to stop a Corbyn-led Remainer alliance sneaking into power and using a rigged second referendum to overturn the votes of 17.4 million Leave voters.
issues.economy: References to spending £200bn on transport and jobs in the Regions as a Brexit dividend.
issues.governance: We need democratic reforms to make Parliament serve the People.
issues.health: Support the NHS with more investment, better management, and less waste.
issues.immigration: We need a fair, firm points-based system for controlled immigration.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Key messages and statistics are focused on the Brexit debate, emphasizing the choice between The Brexit Party and other parties such as Labour and Conservative. The leaflet emphasizes the need to stop what they consider a 'Corbyn-led Remainer alliance'.
